org.openorb.PI
Interface FeatureInitInfo

All Known Implementing Classes:
OpenORBInitInfo
public interface FeatureInitInfo

Init info interface passed to feature initializers.

Version:
$Revision: 1.5 $ $Date: 2002/06/28 08:59:04 $
Author:
Chris Wood

Method Summary

          Get an OpenORB feature.

          Return a reference to the orb loader.

          Return the orb being configured.

Method Detail

orb

public ORB orb()
Return the orb being configured. The orb returned will not have been fully initialized, it should not be used for activating objects or making requests.

getLoader

public ORBLoader getLoader()
Return a reference to the orb loader. This is a shortcut to orb().getLoader().

setFeature

public void setFeature(java.lang.String feature,
                       java.lang.Object reference)
Set an openorb feature.

getFeature

public java.lang.Object getFeature(java.lang.String feature)
Get an OpenORB feature.
